name: MLCYOLOLossDescriptor
desc: The configuration object you use to create the YOLO loss layer.

items.name: init(anchorBoxes: Data, anchorBoxCount: Int)
items.desc: Creates a YOLO loss filter descriptor with the anchor box data and number of anchor boxes you specify.

items.name: var anchorBoxCount: Int
items.desc: The number of anchor boxes you use to detect an object in each grid cell.

items.name: var anchorBoxes: Data
items.desc: Data that contains the width and height for all the anchor boxes.

items.name: var scaleClassLoss: Float
items.desc: The scale factor you use for loss when there are no object classes, and for loss gradient.

items.name: var scaleObjectConfidenceLoss: Float
items.desc: The scale factor you use for object confidence loss and loss gradient.

items.name: var scaleNoObjectConfidenceLoss: Float
items.desc: The scale factor you use for no object confidence loss and loss gradient.

items.name: var scaleSpatialPositionLoss: Float
items.desc: The scale factor you use for spatial position loss and loss gradient.

items.name: var scaleSpatialSizeLoss: Float
items.desc: The scale factor you use for spatial size loss and loss gradient.

items.name: var shouldRescore: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean that indicates whether the layer scales the object confidence loss by the intersection over union (IOU) overlap.
